page.title: 03WORK
page.content: There are two garages in Denholm.One is a filling station and the other only does repair work.There are two knitwear factories in Denholm one of which has a shop on the Main Street.(King and Queen Hussein once visited the shop).The other shops in Denholm are two newsagents a Post Office/confectioner,saddler, hairdresser and butcher.The building containing one of the newsagents was moved from Stobbs Army Camp to Denholm.There is a construction contractor in Denholm, who has built six new houses where a hen run used to be.There is a haulage contractor business in Denholm.Outside of the village people work on farms.There is going to be a new sawmill built just outside of Denholm which is supposed to be the most sophisticated in the Borders.
